item.description: Alright now people.....I realize December is tough.....holidays....money is tight......economic unrest......It's not the best month to spend extra money on anything......Well except sushi.....anway..... I started this long strange wasabi trip back in at the end of 2007 and the start of 2008.....So I figured why not come full circle....go back to the root of all this craziness.....Akasaka......They were always good to me there.....of course after this last debacle at Shangra-crap....I will check to make sure Akasaka has the same owners and a liqour permit.....So come if you can.....come if you will...for our last sushi of 2008.......even if you can't make it..... I thank everyone for making this a great year.....My wife and I have really enjoyed getting to know everyone......HAPPY HOLIDAYS!!!

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Santa Claus Sushi
